price: Muhakkak ki odaların arkasından sana seslenenlerin çoğunun akılları ermez.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يُنَادُونَكَ مِن وَرَآءِ ٱلۡحُجُرَٰتِ أَكۡثَرُهُمۡ لَا يَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna yunādūnaka min warāi al-ḥujurāti aktharuhum lā yaʿqilūna
